resources.string: Introspect on life and think about the mistakes made in the past
Reading good books can help in both soothing your mind and keeping it sharp. Besides, some extra knowledge can always come in handy!
Introspect on your life, especially on your past, present and the future. Think about how your life has been so far. This will help you in gaining a better understanding of yourself.
Meditate at least once a day. Find a quiet, serene place, and meditate for 2-3 minutes at least. It will help calm your mind and you\'ll be able to achieve clarity
Reflect on the acts and the deeds that you\'ve done. Think whether you made the right decisions. What does your conscience say?
Going on a trip will not only refresh your body and mind, but it will also help you gain new perspectives and see the world in a different light. Besides, who doesn\'t want a well earned vacation?
Go somewhere from where you can get a good view of the sun when it sets. You may experience a deep melancholic sorrow, or feel nostalgic, and this will help you put your priorities in focus
Yoga can help clear one\'s body and mind and cleanse one\'s soul. Or so they say. Maybe try it out yourself? Not like you\'ve got anything better to do.
